ValidationRule.description: Prevents use of the Override Initial Disbursement and Override Reno Advance Amount fields on properties related to SAB deals
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( Deal__r.Record_Type_Name__c = "Single_Asset_Bridge_Loan", NOT( $Profile.Name = "System Administrator"), OR( ISCHANGED( Override_Initial_Disbursement__c ), ISCHANGED( Override_Reno_Advance_Amount__c ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Use of the Override Initial Disbursement field and the Override Reno Advance Amount field is restricted on SAB deal properties.
